# WAError.connectionTerminated(_:)

**Case**

An error that occurs if the connection was terminated.

## Declaration

```swift
case connectionTerminated(WAError.ConnectionTerminatedDetails)
```

## Checking for terminated connection

- **WAError.ConnectionTerminatedDetails**: The optional details describing the terminated connection.

items.description: The optional details describing the terminated connection.
items.name: WAError.ConnectionTerminatedDetails
